sentences.sContent: ‘Be prepared’ is the motto of the Boy Scouts.
sentences.sCn: “时刻准备着”是童子军的格言。

remMethod.val: mot(动) + to → 给动作以指示 → 座右铭； 箴言， 格言

trans.tranCn: 座右铭； 箴言， 格言
trans.tranOther: a short sentence or phrase giving a rule on how to behave, which expresses the aims or beliefs of a person, school, or institution
